meanings.definition: Characterized by peculiar or unexpected traits.
meanings.sent1: The girl wore the quirkiest hat to the party.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her quirky sense of style.
meanings.sent3: His quirky habit of collecting rubber ducks always makes us smile.
meanings.sent4: In a world of plain colors, her outfit was the quirkiest rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The quirkiest house on the block had a garden full of upside-down flowers.

meanings.sent1: The quirkiest artist in town painted with her toes.
meanings.sent2: His quirky dance moves always entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The quirkiest cat in the neighborhood liked to chase its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of traditional art, her painting stood out as the quirkiest.
meanings.sent5: The quirkiest student in class always had a pet snail in his pocket.

meanings.sent1: The quirkiest flower in the garden bloomed only at night.
meanings.sent2: Her quirky invention became an overnight sensation.
meanings.sent3: The quirkiest tree in the forest had branches that glowed in the dark.
meanings.sent4: In a collection of antique toys, the quirkiest doll had mismatched eyes.
meanings.sent5: The quirkiest car in the parade was covered in glitter and feathers.
